subject: Basketball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Duke swingman Gerald Henderson has signed with an agent and will remain in the June 25 N.B.A. draft, eliminating the possibility that he could return to the Blue Devils. Henderson averaged 17 points as a junior last season, leading Duke.
snippet: Duke swingman Gerald Henderson has signed with an agent and will remain in the June 25 N.B.A. draft, eliminating the possibility that he could return to the Blue Devils. Henderson averaged 17 points as a junior last season, leading Duke.
